Articles.Content: Just bought KSP Wednesday and love it! Yesterday I got my first successful Kerbin orbit and now tonight a successful Mun orbit. Gonna try to descend to the surface tomorrow.

Welcome to the forums! It took me 20 flights to get off the launch pad because I didn\'t realize A.S.A.S. was important. [:-(

Cool rocket!
Yea, I had the demo for about a week before I realized there was a map view that shows your orbit pattern....guessing didn\'t work very well.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
